nodes.text: Gray Eight was the call sign used by pilot Garik Loran during Wraith Squadron's mission to Storinal. Loran and Atril Tabanne were supposed to commandeer two TIE Fighters at the Revos Spaceport, but when the TIE's were destroyed by Wedge Antilles and Falynn Sandskimmer, Loran and Tabanne were picked up by Wraith Squadron's shuttle Narra instead.
